title: Evidentiary effect of copy of filed document
context: [ยง414D-10] Evidentiary effect of copy of filed document. A certificate attached to a copy of a document bearing the department director&rsquo;s signature (which may be in facsimile) and the seal of the department is conclusive evidence that the original document is on file with the department director. [L 2001, c 105, pt of ยง1]
